text: Marco hooked me up with a fresh fade! Dude knows what he's doing. Chill vibe in the shop.

expected.summary: Marco hooked me up with a fresh fade! Dude knows what he's doing.

text: Cut was aight, not exactly what I wanted. Barber seemed in a rush, barely talked.

expected.summary: Cut was aight, not exactly what I wanted.

text: Man, worst cut ever. Hairline all messed up. John gotta do better, smh.

expected.summary: Worst cut ever. Hairline all messed up.

text: Servicio brutal, el fade quedó perfecto y la música estaba on point. Gracias!

expected.summary: Servicio brutal, el fade quedó perfecto.

text: Cut was decent, but left side uneven. Asked for a shape-up, ended up losing too much length.

expected.summary: Cut was decent, but left side uneven.
